attributes.action: intervene to stop incineration plant proposed in rural Aylesbury Vale
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please help us protect your precious rural environment for future generations by signing our petition.

We are campaigning against plans to site an EfW (Electricity from Waste) incineration plant at Lower Greatmoor Farm Aylesbury Vale.

This is a beautiful green field site in the heart of the ancient Bernwode Forest - a green lung for the environment in North Buckinghamshire. The proposed incinerator building – with a chimney up to 94 m high - and increased waste traffic would dominate the open landscape, blighting Waddesdon Manor and the many beautiful villages and towns in the vale which provide R&R for urban dwellers too. 

Our families, livestock, trees, wildlife, environment and your peace all stand to lose.

Incineration of waste has many problems. It releases greenhouse gasses, creates toxic emissions and hazardous ash, poses significant health risks as well as limits increased recycling and composting. 

Make a difference and tell the Prime Minister to prevent this damaging incineration plan NOW!

government_responses.details:
